comments: This section is for the descriptions of the option arguments for webdriver
--headless: use webdriver without actually opening a web browser
--no-sandbox: do not restrict the environment/functionality where chrome works
--disable-dev-shm-usage: Prevent chrome fail or crash because of some unknown bugs
--allow-insecure-remotehost: Enables TLS/SSL errors on localhost to be ignored
--use-gl=angle: Select which implementation of GL the GPU process should use
